## Known Limitations & Future Work

### priceValidUntil Date
The AI Readiness Session schema includes `"priceValidUntil": "2025-12-31"`. This date will need to be updated if the promotional pricing continues beyond 2025.

### Schema Consolidation (Optional Future Enhancement)
Currently using 7 separate `<script type="application/ld+json">` blocks. Could be consolidated into a single `@graph` structure in the future for cleaner code, though current approach is valid and functional.
